-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Parser/Serialiser for IEEE-754 floating-point values
--   
--   Convert Float and Decimal values to/from raw octets.
@package data-binary-ieee754
@version 0.4.4


module Data.Binary.IEEE754
getFloat16be :: Get Float
getFloat16le :: Get Float
getFloat32be :: Get Float
getFloat32le :: Get Float
getFloat64be :: Get Double
getFloat64le :: Get Double
putFloat32be :: Float -> Put
putFloat32le :: Float -> Put
putFloat64be :: Double -> Put
putFloat64le :: Double -> Put
floatToWord :: Float -> Word32
wordToFloat :: Word32 -> Float
doubleToWord :: Double -> Word64
wordToDouble :: Word64 -> Double
